sentences.sContent: He flung his coat over the back of a chair.

synos.tran: 掷，抛；嘲笑；使陷入；轻蔑地投射；猛动

phrases.pCn: 一举，一鼓作气地，一气呵成地

remMethod.val: fl(看作fly， 飞) ＋ ing → 扔， 掷

trans.tranOther: to throw something somewhere using a lot of force

trans.tranCn: 尽情欢乐的一阵， 一时的放纵
trans.tranOther: a short period of time during which you enjoy yourself without worrying about anything
